name: Rykaart's Restaurant
address: Longridge Wine Estate, Off the R44, Helderbergpad, Stellenbosch
description: Rykaart's Restaurant at Longridge Wine Estate offers a seasonal three-course dining experience, served family-style and crafted with fresh ingredients sourced from the estate’s biodynamic gardens.

name: BlueWave Tech
description: BlueWave Tech provides professional technology solutions including software development, IT consulting, cloud services, and cybersecurity support for businesses across various industries.

name: NextGen Solutions
description: NextGen Solutions delivers innovative technology consulting services focused on optimizing IT operations, improving system security, and supporting businesses through digital transformation.

name: Root44 Wine Emporium
address: Corner of R44 and Annandale Road
description: Root44 Wine Emporium features a restaurant, market, and an extensive selection of local and international wines, offering tastings and a relaxed gourmet experience for visitors.

name: Bragg
address: Unit 9, Montague Industrial Park, 7 Bp Rd, Montague Gardens, Cape Town, 7441, South Africa
description: Bragg Home and Decor specializes in stylish furniture and home décor, offering curated accessories and design solutions that help create modern, inviting living spaces.

name: Cape Grace Hotel
address: West Quay Road, Victoria & Alfred, Cape Town 8001
description: Cape Grace Hotel is a luxury hotel at Cape Town’s V&A Waterfront, offering elegant accommodation, fine dining, spa services, and personalized guest experiences.

name: Tapi Tapi Ice Cream
description: Tapi Tapi Ice Cream offers handcrafted ice creams and desserts, serving a variety of sweet treats in a fun, relaxed, and family-friendly environment.
